recipesJson.name: Sweet Dreams
recipesJson.author: Apoc17
recipesJson.description: Sweet tooth vape with a little bit of a dragonfruit twist.  This one I mix thoroughly for at least a couple of minutes and heat up in the baby bottle warmer for 30 minutes.  Then I let cool topless.  Since it is a creamy vape I let this one sit in a cool dark place for at least a week before I vape.  The longer you wait the better I've let it set for 2 weeks and it is amazing.
